attributes.action: New Treason Laws for joining a terrorist organisations and right of return !
attributes.additional_details: In this review we also need to look at speech that puts British Forces at risk at home. Hate speech which is inline with terrorist organisations against other democratic countries?
attributes.background: A full review of treason laws for terrorism and those joining terror organisations and then wanting to return to the UK . These organisations are in direct opposition to British Forces maintaining international law.  On return pose a direct threat to UK citizens for many years to come?
